forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with thunderstorms by morning. Low near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunderstorms likely. Becoming windy late. Low around 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
